quote_last: “Michael! And Eva! Again, after so long. Pos iste! What a surprise!” The old Greek’s sunburned face widened into a smile, his gray mustache opening above his last good teeth. “Parakalo, you must come in for a glass of raki and some of Adriana’s meze. She would never forgive me.”
title: Project Daedalus
author: Thomas Hoover
